summary: TAKATA RECALL--- HELP--- I AM DRIVING AROUND WITH MY ALMOST 80 YEAR OLD WIFE IN THE FRONT SEAT OF OUR LEXUS..... MANUFACTURES SAYS INFLATORS COULD FAIL AND KILL HER. SHE REFUSES TO RIDE IN THE BACK SEAT LIKE A CHILD. LOCAL CAR DEALER SAYS PARTS STILL NOT AVAILABLE-- I REALLY AM WONDERING WHEN THIS BOMB WILL GO OFF? THIS HAS BEEN ON RECALL FROM MAY 23, 2016. ---- I AM GOING TO HOLD SOME ONE AT NHTSA RESPONSIBLE IF THIS BOMB EXPLODES.... PLEASE HELP US / WE CAN NOT JUST NOT USE THE FRONT SEAT OF THIS CAR.  REV. [XXX]     INFORMATION REDACTED PURSUANT TO THE FREEDOM OF INFORMATION ACT (FOIA), 5 U.S.C. 552(B)(6).  *TR
